Upgrade Your Game!
Learn More

Features

Pogoseat is an enterprise solution for sports teams and concert venues that enables their fans to upgrade seats and purchase unique VIP upgrades during events. Our mission is to provide fans with the ability to optimize their live entertainment experience and teams and venues a platform to increase fan engagement, monetize unused inventory and gather data to improve the fan experience.

Instant Revenue Boost

No more unsold inventory. Sell tickets after the event has started. Our analytics will help you select the perfect price.

Total Integration

Leverage your existing platform. Pogoseat integrates with your loyalty system, CRM, point of sale, and third-party vendors.

In-Depth Analytics

Instant, detailed information at your fingertips. Discover who is upgrading, where they're moving, and how to maximize your revenue.

Powerful Dashboard

Manage events, price rules, and more. Complete control over your events.

White Label

Seen, but not heard. Pogoseat promotes your brand, so your users have a cohesive experience from start to finish.

Zero Maintenance

Hands off all season. Pogoseat integrates your ticketing platform to automatically manage inventory and events. Our customer support handles game-time issues, so you don't have to.

How It Works

See how we can help you upgrade your seat.

Find available seat upgrades

Vew available seat upgrades on the map or list. Click a pin on the map or select a seat from the list.

Pick your seat upgrade

Scan or type in the barcodes for the current seat or seats that you would like to upgrade. See the discounted price for your upgrade and when you are ready, press continue.

Enjoy the game!

Confirm your purchase and get your new tickets. Just show the ushers the tickets on your mobile phone.
